query:
SELECT DISTINCT p.id_rep as id, p.sito as site, p.area as area, p.us as us, p.form as form, p.fabric as fabric, p.note as description, m.id_media as media_id, m.filename as filename, m.filepath as filepath
        FROM pottery_table p
        
            JOIN media_to_entity_table r ON r.id_entity = p.id_rep
            JOIN media_table m ON m.id_media = r.id_media
            
        WHERE (p.exdeco = 'Yes' OR p.intdeco = 'Yes')
        ORDER BY p.id_rep
